item.title: Compile error (Still not fixed)
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

this is the command i use and it works fine:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && c.playerRights == 3) {
for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) {
c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
}
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
}

just change c.playerRights ==3 to c.playerRights ==2
